parameters.content:
# üìä PPC Campaign Intelligence System

Automatically monitors Google Ads campaigns daily, analyzes performance with AI scoring, and alerts your team about scaling opportunities or issues requiring attention.

**AI Analysis:** Evaluates CTR, conversion rate, cost efficiency, and traffic volume to assign performance scores (0-100).

**Setup:**
- Connect Google Ads, Sheets, Slack, SMTP
- Update spreadsheet IDs and Slack channels
- Customize scoring thresholds in code
- Adjust email recipients

**Benefits:**
- Never miss scaling opportunities
- Catch underperforming campaigns early
- Data-driven optimization decisions
- Automated daily reporting

*Built by Daniel Shashko*
[Connect on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-shashko/)
Triggers workflow automatically every morning at 9 AM daily
Pulls all campaign metrics from Google Ads API
Scores campaigns based on CTR, conversions, and cost efficiency
Splits campaigns into high-performers versus worst ones
Records all campaign data to historical log spreadsheet
Logs daily metrics to Google Sheets performance tracking tab
Sends Slack notification for excellent performing campaigns ready to scale
Sends Slack warning for underperforming campaigns requiring immediate action
Creates customized email reports based on campaign performance tier
Sends personalized action plan emails to PPC team members
Calculates total spend, conversions, and campaign distribution summary
